EmailTemplate.name: When was my VISA/Debit card issued?
EmailTemplate.subject: When was my VISA/Debit card issued?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your VISA® Debit card was issued on [date]. For security purposes, the VISA® Debit card is sent from a separate distribution center and will arrive in the mail within 5-7 business days from the issue date.
To activate your debit card: 1. Dial [Phone Number] (You must call from the phone number you added to your profile). 2. Select Option 1 3. Select Option 3 4. Enter your debit card number 5. Enter your full Social Security number
Your card will now be active and ready for signature transactions.
To select a PIN for your debit card: The first time you use your card for an ATM or any Point of Sale (POS) transaction where a PIN is used, the PIN entered on the first transaction becomes the permanent PIN.
We appreciate your business and commit to providing superior Banking products, support and services.
